## Structure

The course is structured of alternating weeks of substantive and technical instruction.

| Week | Focus                                                 |
|------|-------------------------------------------------------|
| 1    | Intro. Computational Social Science                   |
| 2    | Filter Bubbles and Echo Chambers                      |
| 3    | Web tracking and Network Analysis                     |
| 4    | Misinformation and Fake News                          |
| 5    | Linked surveys and Social media analysis              |
| 6    | Polarization and Radicalization                       |
| 7    | Online experiments and Bots                           |
| 8    | Violence and Protest                                  |
| 9    | Social media tracking and Natural Language Processing |
| 10   | Guest lecture: TBD                                    |
